data.summary_suggestion: Search and retrieve treaties with filters
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated collection of treaties laid before Parliament with optional filtering and sorting capabilities. Accepts up to 10 query parameters for filtering by various criteria (e.g., status, department, date range). Returns a TreatyResourceCollection containing treaty resources with their details and related links. Use this operation to discover treaties matching specific parliamentary or departmental criteria.
